docs.snippet: Turkish prosecutors issued arrest warrants for 380 businessmen accused of providing financial support to the network of U.S.-based cleric Fethullah Gulen, who is accused of orchestrating July's failed coup, media reports said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkish prosecutors issued arrest warrants for 380 businessmen accused of providing financial support to the network of U.S.-based cleric Fethullah Gulen, who is accused of orchestrating July's failed coup, media reports said on Thursday.

headline.main: Turkey Orders Detention of 380 Businessmen in Gulen Investigation: AA
headline.print_headline: Turkey Orders Detention of 380 Businessmen in Gulen Investigation: AA

docs.snippet: The Nasdaq squeaked out a record high close on Thursday thanks to Amazon.com, while deep drops in Macy's, Kohl's and other department stores weighed on the broader stock market....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Nasdaq squeaked out a record high close on Thursday thanks to Amazon.com, while deep drops in Macy's, Kohl's and other department stores weighed on the broader stock market.

headline.main: Nasdaq Reaches Record High, Macy's Stirs Retail Fear
headline.print_headline: Nasdaq Reaches Record High, Macy's Stirs Retail Fear

docs.snippet: A leader of suspected sympathizers of the Islamic State group was killed Thursday in a clash with Philippine police in the south, raising fears that his brutal group may retaliate by attacking a huge Catholic procession in Manila next week....
docs.lead_paragraph: A leader of suspected sympathizers of the Islamic State group was killed Thursday in a clash with Philippine police in the south, raising fears that his brutal group may retaliate by attacking a huge Catholic procession in Manila next week.

headline.main: IS Group-Inspired Filipino Militant Killed, Reprisals Feared

docs.snippet: IT research and advisory company Gartner Inc said on Thursday it would buy CEB Inc, a provider of business research and analysis, in a cash-and-stock deal valued at $2.6 billion to expand its business services....
docs.lead_paragraph: IT research and advisory company Gartner Inc said on Thursday it would buy CEB Inc, a provider of business research and analysis, in a cash-and-stock deal valued at $2.6 billion to expand its business services.

headline.main: IT Research Firm Gartner to Buy CEB to Expand Business Analysis
headline.print_headline: IT Research Firm Gartner to Buy CEB to Expand Business Analysis

docs.snippet: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as recent partnerships with pharmacy benefit managers (PBMs) and insurance companies helped boost sales of prescription drugs as well as non-drug items....
docs.lead_paragraph: Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as recent partnerships with pharmacy benefit managers (PBMs) and insurance companies helped boost sales of prescription drugs as well as non-drug items.

headline.main: Walgreens Profit Beats Estimates on PBM Partnerships
headline.print_headline: Walgreens Profit Beats Estimates on PBM Partnerships

docs.snippet: Romania's ombudsman asked the Constitutional Court on Thursday to strike down a law that bars people convicted of a criminal offence from joining the government, a move that could help the leader of the ruling party to become prime minister....
docs.lead_paragraph: Romania's ombudsman asked the Constitutional Court on Thursday to strike down a law that bars people convicted of a criminal offence from joining the government, a move that could help the leader of the ruling party to become prime minister.

headline.main: Romanian Ombudsman Challenges Law Banning Convicted Officials From Government
headline.print_headline: Romanian Ombudsman Challenges Law Banning Convicted Officials From Government

docs.snippet: A law North Carolina Republicans approved scaling back the new Democratic governor's control over election boards won't be enforced until his legal challenge to it is resolved, state judges decided Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A law North Carolina Republicans approved scaling back the new Democratic governor's control over election boards won't be enforced until his legal challenge to it is resolved, state judges decided Thursday.

headline.main: Judges Decide to Keep North Carolina Election Law Blocked
headline.print_headline: Judges Decide to Keep North Carolina Election Law Blocked

docs.snippet: India is resisting tech giant Apple Inc's demand for tax incentives to make iPhones in the country, with the trade minister saying on Thursday that the government may not make exceptions for the U.S. company....
docs.lead_paragraph: India is resisting tech giant Apple Inc's demand for tax incentives to make iPhones in the country, with the trade minister saying on Thursday that the government may not make exceptions for the U.S. company.

headline.main: India Reluctant to Give Special Tax Incentives to Apple
